html2text >= 2016.4.2, < 2016.5
pystache >= 0.5, < 0.6

[dev]
sphinx >= 1.2.2, < 2
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2
pytest-runner >= 2.7, < 3
pytest >= 2.9, < 3
pytest-mock >= 0.11, < 1
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3

[setup]
sphinx >= 1.2.2, < 2
sphinx_rtd_theme >= 0.1.6, < 1
lowdown >= 0.1.0, < 2
pytest-runner >= 2.7, < 3

[tests]
pytest >= 2.9, < 3
pytest-mock >= 0.11, < 1
pytest-cov >= 2, < 3
